B.A. in Computer Science with Concentration in Information Technology

The B.A. program is designed for students interested in pursuing a career in one of the three concentrations. Students in the Information Technology concentration will learn about the usability, security, and reliability of IT infrastructures with an emphasis on technical writing and communications skills. Students with an IT concentration will be project managers, product managers, and will manage the resources, documents, and customer interaction in IT.
